brief_title: Study of Protein Translocation in Patients With Beta-Oxidation Disorders
brief_summary: OBJECTIVES: I. Characterize inheritance patterns of mutations in patients with beta-oxidation disorders.
detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE: Patients undergo clinical and molecular analysis of beta-oxidation enzyme metabolism. The evaluation includes a urinary metabolite profile, and DNA and familial studies.
criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA: Beta-oxidation disorder, including: Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Long-chain 3-hydroxyacyl coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Very-long-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Short-chain 3-hydroxyacyl coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Long-chain 3-ketoacyl-coenzyme A thiolase deficiency Trifunctional protein deficiency Patient age: 1 day and over
